title: Communication Systems
description: To present the fundamentals of modern digital communication systems and evaluate their performance with realistic channel models.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 3020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3084 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
